channel.title: [ I Need Help ]
channel.description:
[b]THIS IS GETTING ANNOYING[/b]
I've been putting up my server for the best 2 weeks but their has been a big problem since. I don't know what kind of stupid server this is but I really like it. The problem is that everytime a players screen freezes or everytime a player gets a connection lost during they are on my server, half of them come back with a reset account. [b]THIS IS NOT GOOD!!! [/b]
I'm sure that this has something to do with Player.Handler....Player.Java???
But I really really have no clue why this is happening. The players are getting upset with the way the server is reseting their accounts. If anyone has any [b]CLUE[/b] why this is happening. Please HElp!

item.title: [ I Need Help ]
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

Aurai, how did you get 11 rep in like 5 hours? And you only had an account for like 2 days… ah well, just make the backup command…

Read full topic

item.title: [ I Need Help ]
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

[quote=“Aurai, post:6, topic:179388”]Killer Numa, never trust what a console says, you can never truly tell what’s going on in the JVM.
Its because the account gets opened but never gets the ability to save.
Its likely a crash in the source, probably unfixable.
Find a new one.[/quote]

This is impossible… I want someone who knows!!! There has to be a way i can fix this!

Read full topic

item.title: [ I Need Help ]
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

Killer Numa, never trust what a console says, you can never truly tell what’s going on in the JVM.
Its because the account gets opened but never gets the ability to save.
Its likely a crash in the source, probably unfixable.
Find a new one.

Read full topic

item.title: [ I Need Help ]
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

No. Its not that. I’ve read my run.server and it says the account has been saved and yet it stil resets. Even my admin reset.

Read full topic

item.title: [ I Need Help ]
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Lusfr:

make a backup command and thenb a command to call the backup if they get reset

The reason is because the account didn’t get to save the information of the account.

Read full topic

item.title: [ I Need Help ]
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

How would i make a backup command?

Read full topic

item.title: [ I Need Help ]
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

make a backup command and thenb a command to call the backup if they get reset
